import { useState } from "react"; // import { JobContext } from '../context/JobContext' import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import "../css/JobForm.css"; import axios from "axios"; function JobForm() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ title: "", description: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleClick = async () => { await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/upload", inputs); setInputs({ title: "", description: "", }); }; return (

{Object.keys(inputs).map((key, index) => ( {key === "title" ? key.toUpperCase() : key[0].toUpperCase() + key.slice(1)} ))} {/* Job Title setTitle(e.target.value)} value={title} autoFocus /> Job Description setDescription(e.target.value)} value={description} /> */} {/* // */}
); } export default JobForm;
